attributes.action: to keep sarah's law in place (families should know when a convicted peadophile is living within the area)
attributes.additional_details: sarahs law needs to be kept in place for the benefit of the public, especially those with children. convicted criminals are let out to re offend again and again which ruins the lives of innocent people.  they do not deserve rights the moment they decide to offend the first time round.  they are not petty criminals of theft where they can learn from mistakes, they are generally sick individuals that need to be tracked or kept away from the public entirely.
